definition: to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)

sentences.english: Moisturize your face in the morning and evening with natural oils.
sentences.chinese: 润肺你的脸在早上和傍晚天然油脂。

sentences.english: Lungs and they cough, Porridge Riga lily.
sentences.chinese: 润肺又止咳，粥里加百合。

sentences.english: Yin lungs and good, porridge plus Tremella.
sentences.chinese: 滋阴润肺好，煮粥加银耳。

sentences.english: Can enhance the strength of lungs and cough.
Almond is a good fruit, which can make girls beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁，一种可以美容润肺的好吃果子。

sentences.english: Dangling dry autumn air, easily injured Jinye, the diet should be Ziyin Runfei suitable.
sentences.chinese: 秋季燥气当令，易伤津液，故饮食应以滋阴润肺为宜。

definition: to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to benefit the stomach and increase fluids (idiom)
to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
Sichuan fritillary bulb (Bulbus fritillariae cirrhosae, used in TCM)
(TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm
